docs.snippet: When I complained to my mother about how little sleep I was getting when my oldest son was an infant, she asked me why I’d get up in the night — that, she said, was my wife’s job. Six years later, I’m still getting up in the night, but now...
docs.abstract: When I complained to my mother about how little sleep I was getting when my oldest son was an infant, she asked me why I’d get up in the night — that, she said, was my wife’s job. Six years later, I’m still getting up in the night, but now I’d give her a different answer.

headline.main: Getting Up in the Night Is Your Wife's Job

docs.snippet: In a story Feb. 28 about health care, The Associated Press incorrectly identified Rep. Cathy McMorris Rodgers as vice chairman of the Republican Conference. She is the chairman of the conference....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story Feb. 28 about health care, The Associated Press incorrectly identified Rep. Cathy McMorris Rodgers as vice chairman of the Republican Conference. She is the chairman of the conference.

docs.snippet: The austere workroom from the 1910s home of the modernist composer Charles Ives in West Redding, Conn., has been transported to Manhattan....
docs.lead_paragraph: The austere workroom from the 1910s home of the modernist composer Charles Ives in West Redding, Conn., has been transported to Manhattan.
docs.abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; workroom from 1910s home of modernist composer Charles Ives in Connecticut is on display at American Academy of Arts and Letters; exhibit of medieval alabaster sculptures will open at Museum of Biblical Art in Manhattan.

headline.main: Charles Ives’s Workroom, Pencil Shavings Preserved
